name: Core Keeper
author: pterodactyl@yannik-sc.de
description: Explore an endless cavern of creatures, relics and resources in a mining sandbox adventure for 1-8 players. Mine, build, fight, craft and farm to unravel the mystery of the ancient Core.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

set -e

# Core Keeper Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt -y --install-recommends install curl ca-certificates lib32gcc-s1

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd

tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd

cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
chmod +x ./steamcmd.sh

export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous +app_update 1007 +app_update 1963720 +quit

variables.name: World Name
variables.description: The name to use for the server.

variables.name: World Seed
variables.description: The seed to use for a new world. Set to 0 to generate random seed.

variables.name: Game id
variables.description: Game ID to use for the server. Need to be at least 23 characters and alphanumeric, excluding Y,y,x,0,O. Empty or not valid means a new ID will be generated at start.

variables.name: Data path
variables.description: Save file location. If not set it defaults to a subfolder named "DedicatedServer" at the default Core Keeper save location.

variables.name: Max players
variables.description: Maximum number of players that will be allowed to connect to server.

variables.name: Library path
variables.description: LD_LIBRARY_PATH is required to run the server
